name: Money Swipe
summary:
Similar to match 3 games but with a fun and simple style of gameplay. Match the money symbols and score high points! 'Classic Grab' version included, with the option to purchase additional game modes. Plan your strategy to save your last move on all the high values, or just swipe all the pairs. Occasionally, a WILD x10 symbol will appear but use it wisely on the high values. After each game, your score is saved on a local High Score list & global leaderboard Game Center for you to compete again the next time. Retina graphics and fun music, you can play over and over.
4 Game modes: Classic Grab, Timed Grab, Money Stash & Fast Cash.
